metadata.title: Alex and Ani Collaborations Harry Potter Duo Charms Expandable Bangle for Women, Shiny Finish, 2 to 3.5 in
features: JEWELRY FOR EVERLASTING MAGIC: Express your resourcefulness with this Alex and Ani Harry Potter Accio Duo Charm Bangle, adding a touch of magic to your accessory wardrobe
TIMELESS ACCESSORIES: This beautiful adjustable bangle features a color infused blue charm that says “Accio broom” and a cute silver broom charm, perfect for Harry Potter fans
SIZING AND CLOSURE: Our innovative, patented, and completely original technology replaces traditional clasps with a sliding mechanism to customize this classic bracelet’s size from 2" to 3.5" wide
COMPOSITION: Crafted with love and care in the U.S.A., this effortless accessory is based in a nickel-free brass/copper metal mix that amplifies its symbolism for the giver and wearer
A THOUGHTFUL REMINDER: Show the world your true unique self with this Alex and Ani Harry Potter Accio Duo Charm Expandable Bangle, an extension of your personal style
description: Since 1997, the world has been captivated by the magic of Harry Potter. These stories remind us that the magical power of friendship, courage, and perseverance can carry us through dark times. Wear this Charm Bangle and remember to summon your powers in tough times. Alex and Ani Harry Potter Duo Charm Bangle expresses your love of the Harry Potter series. Crafted with love and care, this beautiful bangle features a color infused circle charm with a magic spell and a magical object charm. Wear it solo to make a simple statement or add it to your bangle stack for texture and variety. Our expandable bangle adjusts from 2" to 3.5" in width. Innovative, patented, and completely original technology ensures a customized fit of this elegant bangle bracelet. Made in the U.S.A, this pretty bracelet is nickel-free and has a timeless classic design. HARRY POTTER characters, names, and related indicia copyright and trademark of Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. We believe that jewelry should be a meaningful representation of who you are, and the characteristics you strive to embody. Choose the Alex and Ani Affinity Bangle as a beautiful gift to yourself- a versatile accessory for any occasion.

title: Alex and Ani Harry Potter, Accio Duo Charm, SS
